name: Pixel Avatar Maker
description:
Make your own pixel art avatar with this cool little game!

Select the blue buttons on the bottom to select different avatar features. Change the colour of the item by using the colour selection on the left. Use the arrows to choose different options.

Display mode hides the UI so you can take a clean screenshot of your avatar. Press Esc to exit display mode and go back to the editor.

Feel free to share your avatars in the comments!
